input_args.text: 'Previous Why Are Russia and China Buying Up All of America’s Food? Paul Martin and Dave Hodges \nThe Port of New Orleans is quickly running out of food. The Russians and the Chinese are buying up a good portion of America’s grain and food. Inside sources are saying that China is preparing to buy up all beef. What is behind these actions. Could it have anything to do with an impending War between China and Russia and the United States. \nThe threat is greater than one can imagine. The details are in the following video.'
